content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing needs today?
I want to speak to a manager right now. This is urgent!
I understand your urgency and am here to help. Could you please briefly describe the plumbing issue? I want to make sure we address your concerns promptly.
Stop with the questions. I told you, I want a manager. I'm not going to explain anything to a bot.

I’m sorry for any frustration. I’m an AI assistant here to coordinate your service as smoothly as possible. Since you’ve requested a manager, I’m escalating the conversation so a human operator can assist you shortly.
